props.name: text
props.description: Text for the error link item. If content is provided in the default slot, this prop will be ignored.

props.name: targetId
props.description: ID of the component on the page that the error link should jump to.

props.name: href
props.description: Href attribute for the error link item. Only use this if you're linking to another page. If you're linking to an element on this page, use `targetId` instead.

props.name: component
props.description: The component used to render the link, for example `RouterLink`. Will default to `a` if an `href` or `targetId` is provided or no link otherwise.

slots.name: default
slots.description: The content of the error link. If content is provided in this slot, the `text` prop will be ignored.
